alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Geauga, eastern Lake and southern Ashtabula Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Russell, or 8 miles southwest of Chardon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Chardon, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, South Russell, Madison, Middlefield, Perry, Burton, Chesterland, Kirtland, Chagrin Falls, Huntsburg, Moreland Hills, Claridon, Gates Mills, Austinburg, Montville, Hartsgrove and Roaming Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake
